election.tally
Class Ballot

java.lang.Object
  election.tally.Ballot

public class Ballot
extends java.lang.Object

The ordered set of preferences from a ballot paper in an Irish election, which uses the Proportional Representation Single Transfer Vote. (PRSTV) system.

Author:
Dermot Cochran
See Also:
Department of Environment and Local Government, Count Requirements and Commentary on Count Rules, section 3-14

Field Detail

MAX_BALLOTS

public static final int MAX_BALLOTS
Maximum possible number of ballots based on maximum population size for a five seat constituency i.e. at most 30,000 people per elected representative.

See Also:
"Constitution of Ireland, Article 16, Section 2", Constant Field Values

NONTRANSFERABLE

public static final int NONTRANSFERABLE
Candidate ID value to use for non-transferable ballot papers

See Also:
Department Of Environment and Local Government, Count requirements and Commentary an Count Rules, section 7, pages 23-27, Constant Field Values

numberOfPreferences

protected int numberOfPreferences
Total number of valid preferences on this ballot paper

positionInList

Position within preference list

preferenceList

protected int[] preferenceList
List of candidates in order of preference
